0.0.1.name: wordpress/real-wysiwyg
0.0.1.description: The Real WYSIWYG plugin turns the TinyMCE Visual Editor in to a real WYSIWYG editor. TinyMCE allows you to import style sheets into the editor window. The Real WYSIWYG plugin uses this ability to import your theme's style sheet, allowing it to display the post as it will look when published.
